Reviews.Title: Loved It
Reviews.Author: Earl D Vass
Reviews.Content: Bought for my grandson who like to make his own short movies and he is about to have a new brother or sister and would be able to take pictures for his own instead of using phone etc...

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 8 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories & Warranty, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon PowerShot SX160 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Wide-Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3.0-Inch LCD (Red)
8 Gigabyte Secure Digital SD High Capacity Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Neck Strap & Belt Loop
Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - Quality Fiber Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX160 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Wide-Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3.0-Inch LCD (Red) + 7pc Bundle 8GB Accessory Kit
